answers.answer: not curable but controllable.insulin is a good way, so is exercise (if BG is not over 250 USA standards) diet also works.ALL carbohydrates raise BGthe bes way to lower BG is the way that works for you.

1. As a last recourse insulin is used to reduce blood sugar levels.2. Google search returned nothing on Daniel tablets. Do not believe hypes. If it is not approved by your governments medical board avoid it.3. Currently there is no cure for diabetes. In its early stages some people have been found to reverse their diabetes back to normal levels. This takes lifestyle changes one must follow and adhere to for the rest of their life. Doing so one will be able to control and manage their blood sugar levels appropriately.
